channel.title: Strahdo Mojado
channel.itunes:subtitle: A D&D actual play podcast.
channel.itunes:author: Wet Maynard
channel.itunes:summary:
"You stalked through the Svalich Wood for hours, maybe days, surrounded by that damnable mist. Cold.. clammy.. chilling you to the bone."
Strahdo Mojado is a Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition Actual Play of the published campaign, "Curse of Strahd", written by Chris Perkins.
Led by Dungeon Masters Arthur Milliken and Anna Wenger, our group of unwitting heroes is drawn into the mysterious and (un)deadly world of Barovia, where Count Strahd von Zarovich will face the greatest threat of his existence yet. Spring cleaning will be a real rumspringa for this less-than-modern yet more-than-man multi-centenarian with a thirst for the divine.
channel.description:

channel.itunes:keywords: Dungeons and Dragons, D&D, 5th Edition, Actual Play, Wet Maynard, Curse of Strahd

item.title: Ep 1: Invitation to Death
item.itunes:title: Ep 1: Invitation to Death
item.itunes:author: Wet Maynard
item.itunes:summary:
CHAPTER ONE: TINOK ET OHR.
The wandering party is met by an unsettled Rosavalda and Thornbolt. Ken gives warm greeting to a flock of innocuous bats. Our heroes introduce themselves and their sometime creepy gothic trinkets. Lisbet inspires with her prolific use of prestidigitation.
"I did it all for the nookie, the nookie. So you can take that cookie..." -Lord von Durst the Lympbyscut, in the Year Nineteen Ninety-of-nines of Our Lord JesuCrist.com.
Will you answer?
This is a Wet Maynard production. Additional artwork in cover image by Loran DeSore, kindly used with permission.
item.description:

The wandering party is met by an unsettled Rosavalda and Thornbolt. Ken gives warm greeting to a flock of innocuous bats. Our heroes introduce themselves and their sometime creepy gothic trinkets. Lisbet inspires with her prolific use of prestidigitation.
"I did it all for the nookie, the nookie. So you can take that cookie..." -Lord von Durst the Lympbyscut, in the Year Nineteen Ninety-of-nines of Our Lord JesuCrist.com.
Will you answer?
This is a Wet Maynard production. Additional artwork in cover image by Loran DeSore, kindly used with permission.
item.itunes:keywords: Dungeons and Dragons, D&D, 5th Edition, Actual Play, Wet Maynard, Curse of Strahd, Death House

item.title: Ep 2: My Most Pathetic Servant
item.itunes:title: Ep 2: My Most Pathetic Servant
item.itunes:author: Wet Maynard
item.itunes:summary:
Tinok remembers a dumb waiter, drinks? Short rest in a den of wolves. Roll for not needing his light, well snacked! Gustav's library. Dronk writes a song. A hidden cache. Almost a Ravenloft. My most pathetic servant. Conservatory dog collar. Busted heads. Disarming an empty suit.
This is a Wet Maynard production. Additional artwork in cover image by Loran DeSore, kindly used with permission.
item.description:
Tinok remembers a dumb waiter, drinks? Short rest in a den of wolves. Roll for not needing his light, well snacked! Gustav's library. Dronk writes a song. A hidden cache. Almost a Ravenloft. My most pathetic servant. Conservatory dog collar. Busted heads. Disarming an empty suit.
This is a Wet Maynard production. Additional artwork in cover image by Loran DeSore, kindly used with permission.
item.itunes:keywords: Dungeons and Dragons, D&D, 5th Edition, Actual Play, Wet Maynard, Curse of Strahd, Death House

item.title: Ep 3: Don't Wake the Baby
item.itunes:title: Ep 3: Don't Wake the Baby
item.itunes:author: Wet Maynard
item.itunes:summary:
A disarming meeting with a corporate suit. Dronk splits his plate. Gustav and Elizabeth's suite master and Tinok's suite broom. What's a Bezant or two between friends? Lisbet makes things clean! Ken proves that we are not all vampires. Tinok reflects on a shattered past. I told you not to wake the Baby! Buffy may not be effective, but she's determined. Swoosh. Swoosh.
This is a Wet Maynard production. Additional artwork in cover image by Loran DeSore, kindly used with permission.

item.title: Ep 4: One Must Die
item.itunes:title: Ep 4: One Must Die
item.itunes:author: Wet Maynard
item.itunes:summary:
Our heroes encounter Rose and Thorn in the attic. A child's toy reveals a downward descent. A long rest. An even longer rest. Verbal intercourse with Grick. Straw beds and footlockers. A narrowly avoided trap. He is the Ancient, he is the Land. A goblin's glove. A small leap for dragonkind. Tinok discovers his destiny.
This is a Wet Maynard production. Additional artwork in cover image by Loran DeSore, kindly used with permission.

item.title: (DM) Ep 5: Masters of the D
item.itunes:title: (DM) Ep 5: Masters of the D
item.itunes:author: Wet Maynard
item.itunes:summary:
We take a break from the story of Strahdo Mojado to go back in time, when our twin Dungeon Masters Anna and Arthur meet up to discuss running Curse of Strahd. Follow along with our DM's as they review the Death House and its macabre characters. Listen in as they setup their diabolical plans for our heroes and judge for yourself whether or not our DMs succeed.
This is your peek behind the Dungeon Master's screen and should benefit DM's new and old. If you name is Buffy, Bluffy, Dronk, Ken, Lisbet or Tinok: DO NOT LISTEN -- THERE BE SPOILERS AHEAD.
This is a Wet Maynard production. Music: "Insomnia" by Gregoire Lourme.

item.itunes:keywords: Dungeons and Dragons, D&D, 5th Edition, Actual Play, Wet Maynard, Curse of Strahd, Death House, Masters of the D, Dungeon Master

item.title: (DM) Ep 6: Death House Memories
item.itunes:title: (DM) Ep 6: Death House Memories
item.itunes:author: Wet Maynard
item.itunes:summary:
(Masters of the D): Our DMs continue planning for the opening chapter of Strahdo Mojado, and their discussion veers into personal territory as Anna and Arthur recount the role D&D -- and God -- played in their own lives. Anna remembers her relationship with Lorgoth the Decayer. Arthur takes Anna through Strahd's daily routine. Our heroes arrive on the scene.
This is a Wet Maynard production. Music: "Memories" by Grégoire Lourme
item.description:

item.itunes:keywords: Dungeons and Dragons, D&D, 5th Edition, Actual Play, Wet Maynard, Curse of Strahd, Death House, Masters of the D, Dungeon Master

item.title: Ep 7: Men of Letters
item.itunes:title: Ep 7: Men of Letters
item.itunes:author: Wet Maynard
item.itunes:summary:
CHAPTER 2: MEAT PIES
Tinok has made a choice. Our heroes encounter a pastry cart in the rain. Morgantha peddles meat pies. Two clerics walk into a bar, and discover a plea for help. Bluffy hunts for snarfs and werewolves. Lisbet's misty step takes her far indeed. Another corpse reveals another letter. Ismark the Lesser knows more.
Watch video for this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/eJe7-o6HeFU
This is a Wet Maynard production. Additional artwork in cover image by Loran DeSore, kindly used with permission.

item.title: (DM) Ep 8: Into the Mists
item.itunes:title: (DM) Ep 8: Into the Mists
item.itunes:author: Wet Maynard
item.itunes:summary:
(Masters of the D): Dungeon Masters Anna and Arthur review Strahdo Mojado Chapter 1 while also planning Chapter 2. Our DMs zoom out to establish who our heroes are, where did they come from and why are they participating in this adventure. They also learn how to tell fortunes while reading a Tarokka deck, and map out Tinok's long road to redemption.
Watch video for this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/vYa_xnyU1dc
STRAHDO MOJADO PLAYERS: DO NOT LISTEN - THERE BE SPOILERS AHEAD. This is a Wet Maynard production.

item.title: Ep 9: Stations of the Boss
item.itunes:title: Ep 9: Stations of the Boss
item.itunes:author: Wet Maynard
item.itunes:summary:
If there's anything we know, it's Fair Use. Ismark the Lesser reads two letters. Arik the barkeep cleans a glass. Ken takes Tinok to church. A handsome man carries a spider. At the Burgomaster's mansion, Ismark introduces Ireena and his father to Buffy, who takes precautions against the undead. The Wiz advises Ken on fashion. Next stop: the Abbey of Krezk.
Watch video for this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/tOjLx5l8nBA.
This is a Wet Maynard production. Additional artwork in cover image by Loran DeSore, kindly used with permission.

item.title: Ep 10: Branding Smite
item.itunes:title: Ep 10: Branding Smite
item.itunes:author: Wet Maynard
item.itunes:summary:
There's leveling up, and there's leveling down. Strahd is a problem. The Wiz is obviously a what? Beauty is in the eye of the beholder. Am I a little bit sketchy? Buffy casts Branding Smite. Lisbet sends a message. Ken congratulates Buffy. Stanimir invites Buffy into his wagon. A mournful accordion plays Madam Eva's tent. Our heroes find diaries. Eva deals from the low deck. Buffy needs an attitude adjustment. Eva deals from the high deck.
Watch video for this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/XxRQLBViaUc.
This is a Wet Maynard production. Additional artwork in cover image by Loran DeSore, kindly used with permission.

item.title: (DM) Ep 11: In the Butcher's Kitchen
item.itunes:title: (DM) Ep 11: In the Butcher's Kitchen
item.itunes:author: Wet Maynard
item.itunes:summary:
(Masters of the D): Before our in-studio hijinks began, our devious Dungeon Masters sat down with Luis Reyes of Butcher Bird Studios to dissect Curse of Strahd and prepare for our heroes to explore the doomed Village of Barovia.
Watch video for this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/tcDA3_boC8s.
This is a Wet Maynard production.

item.title: Ep 12: Dream Pastries
item.itunes:title: Ep 12: Dream Pastries
item.itunes:author: Wet Maynard
item.itunes:summary:
Our heroes play a round of Kiss and Tell. Bluffy sees rainbows. Stanimir says goodbye. Bluffy greets a gallows-mate. The Biz discovers Tinok in a holy puddle. Bluffy lingers at the crossroads. Ken lights a good-looking blaze. Bluffy digs for buried treasure.
They ride into the heart of Barovia. A windmill sits atop a promontory. Bluffy speaks to a raven. Ismark takes action. Morgantha welcomes them into Old Bonegrinder. I'm happy because... I'm unhappy because... I want....
This is a Wet Maynard production. Additional artwork in cover image by Loran DeSore, kindly used with permission.

item.title: (DM) Ep 13: Bonegrinder
item.itunes:title: (DM) Ep 13: Bonegrinder
item.itunes:author: Wet Maynard
item.itunes:summary: (Masters of the D): The Hags of Old Bonegrinder plot to make battle, corrupt hearts, and sell pies. This is a Wet Maynard production.

item.title: (DM) Ep 14: Vallaki View
item.itunes:title: (DM) Ep 14: Vallaki View
item.itunes:author: Wet Maynard
item.itunes:summary: (Masters of the D): Our DMs look ahead to the village of Vallaki, where our campaign is almost certain to go off the rails.
item.description: (Masters of the D): Our DMs look ahead to the village of Vallaki, where our campaign is almost certain to go off the rails.
item.itunes:keywords: Dungeons and Dragons, D&D, 5th Edition, Wet Maynard, Curse of Strahd, Dungeon Master, Masters of the D

item.title: Ep 15: Gentleman Callers
item.itunes:title: Ep 15: Gentleman Callers
item.itunes:author: Wet Maynard
item.itunes:summary:
Ken opens his journal. Buffy likes the Sunsword and the Enemy. Recalling Bonegrinder, the fog is heavy. A raven cackles. Buffy gazes at a Vampire Slayer. Morgantha and others take their leave. Buffy checks her sanity. Ismark mixes ichor. Offalia wiggles her worm. Opposites attract!! Ken grapples a Slayer. Listen, wrong address! "Don't you wish you knew? Zing!"
Watch video for this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/XRQaJbZr-60.
This is a Wet Maynard production.
item.description:
Ken opens his journal. Buffy likes the Sunsword and the Enemy. Recalling Bonegrinder, the fog is heavy. A raven cackles. Buffy gazes at a Vampire Slayer. Morgantha and others take their leave. item.itunes:keywords: Dungeons and Dragons, D&D, 5th Edition, Actual Play, Wet Maynard, Curse of Strahd, Strahdo Mojado

item.title: Ep 16: Chalky, Tasteless and Delicious
item.itunes:title: Ep 16: Chalky, Tasteless and Delicious
item.itunes:author: Wet Maynard
item.itunes:summary:
Caught in the Bonegrinder, stripped down to skivvies. That's how Buffy likes it. But they are terrible guests, sorry! Ismark sings a new tune after a word or two from Offalia. Night falls and even with a pillow, Buffy has disturbing meat pie-fueled dreams. What's on the Meechum tapes? Why do we think we're her? Anyway, weird dream, don't eat any more meat pies everybody. Next morning, Buffy and Offalia swoop off to Vallaki to sell some pies!
Watch video for this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/c-fh7oh0ld8.
This is a Wet Maynard production.
